survey_name: Professional Development and Continuous Learning Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand professionals' preferences, challenges, and motivations related to continuous learning and professional development in the current job market.

questions.question_text: How important is continuous learning for your career growth?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure perceived importance. Ensure the scale is balanced with a neutral midpoint.
questions.scripter_notes: Single-choice radio buttons with vertical layout for mobile-friendliness.

script.question_text: How important is continuous learning for your career growth?

questions.question_text: What types of professional development activities have you participated in during the past 12 months? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Multi-select question to capture diverse learning methods. Include an exhaustive list of common professional development activities.
questions.scripter_notes: Multi-choice checkboxes with 'Select all that apply' instruction. Randomize option order to reduce bias.

script.question_text: What types of professional development activities have you participated in during the past 12 months? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What is the biggest challenge you face in pursuing professional development?
answer_options: Not sure where to focus my learning
questions.client_notes: Single-choice question to identify primary barriers. Include an 'Other' option with text input for unlisted challenges.
questions.scripter_notes: Radio button selection with an optional 'Other (please specify)' text field.
